wordpressWpDailyReads.title: July 5, Teaching Kids to Save
wordpressWpDailyReads.content:
Schools out for the summer. I enjoyed a nice summer Sunday at the pool with my kids. One of the things you don’t think about as a parent is teaching your kids financial literacy and the importance of saving early. We want to make sure we our teaching good spending habits.
